title: One person dead, one in custody after shooting
content:
KUSA - One person is dead after a shooting in the Ruby Hill neighborhood on Monday.
Police say it happened on the 3000 block of Colorado Ave. and Federal Boulevard.
One person is in custody. No names have been released at this time, and it's unclear what led up to the shooting.
9NEWS will update this story as more information is released.
#DPD update 3000 block W. Colorado: Shooting now death investigation. Victim was pronounced. 1 suspect in custody.
— Denver Police Dept. (@DenverPolice) January 24, 2017
